name: Entertaining Film Stars Online Quiz | Name the Player | 25 Questions

questions.text: Elizabeth Taylor played Pearl Slaghoople in which film?
options: Cat On a Hot Tin Roof (1958)
questions.explanation:
The Flintstones (1994).
